name: Current week's absences
body: - new dashboard widget for current week's absences

name: Bug fixes and improvements for Daily Attendance
body:
- only active children are shown during roll call
- loading indicator

name: Bug fixes and simplification for Daily Attendance
body:
- fixed bug creating duplicate entries for some month when adding daily attendance
- simplified editing of daily attendance in the calendar view

name: Daily Attendance & Live Sync
body:
- new major feature: manage daily attendance
- database is continuously syncing with server now (live sync)
- technical logging information is uploaded for development team in the background

name: Minor fixes
body:
- fixed broken "Add Child" link
- allow changing of school in Child Details
- fixed broken sort of some columns in Children List

name: Fixed 'Add Attendance' not saving
body: - fixed saving attendance through 'Add Attendance' page

name: Improved 'Add Attendance'
body: - improved performance when adding attendance in bulk

name: Hotfixes
body:
- several small, urgent bug fixes
- added additional fields to Child

name: Attendance, Notes & Coaching Managers
body:
- New Feature: Add monthly attendance data for a whole school/coaching batch easily
- New Feature: Manager for Notes/Reports to be filtered by different criteria
- Preview: Coaching Planner to easily see learning status of all children and rearrange groups
- photos of individual children can be displayed
- Back button can be used to return to previously filtered children list
- various small improvements and fixes

name: Extended Interface & Data
body:
- added Health section to Child
- separate coaching and school attendance data for Child
- added Materials section to Child
- added Education & ASER Results section to Child
- added Progress dashboard widget

name: Improvements & Bug Fixes
body:
- added quick action button (bottom left)
- several minor bug fixes and improvements

name: Bug Fixes
body:
- fixed Dashboard children count
- fixed search results not opening from details page
- fixed some problems with attendance and reports
- improved child details layout
- fixed update notifications

name: Editing Children
body: Editing and Creating children is now possible

name: Pilot Release
body:
Pilot Release: HELGO
